title: Any other UK buyers received faulty Pixel 4a today?
content: Very disappointed, new Pixel 4a arrived today and within one hour of setting it up it is turning on and off at random, then says battery 0% then higher percentage then switches off and repeat...and looking on these forums i am not the only one who has had problems...so just wondering if anyone else has had the same depressing experience in the UK...even the store help feature wasn't much help and all i succeeded in doing is starting a return...
